global.noGuildPlayer: ü§ñ I am currently not playing anything.
global.unknownGuild: ‚ùå I can't figure out which server you are on!

resume.description: Resumes playback of the currently paused song.

stop.description: Stops the player, clears the queue and disconnects the bot.

setvolume.description: Sets the bot volume for all tracks for all users.

play.description: Immediately plays a song/playlist (stops current song if playing).
play.optionDescription: Song/playlist to search, supported services: YouTube and Spotify.
play.noTracksFound: ‚ùå No songs found for your search "{query}"
play.insufficientVoiceChannelPermissions: ‚ùå I don't have sufficient permissions to play music in your voice channel "{channel}"!
play.userNotInVoiceChannel: ‚ùå You must be in a voice channel to play music!

add.description: Adds a song/playlist to the end of the queue.

queue.description: Lists all songs of the current queue.

song.description: Outputs information about the current song.

help.description: Get an overview of all my commands.

repeat.description: Sets the repeat mode for songs.
repeat.modeDescription: How should the music be repeated? Default: No repetition

seek.description: Seeks the current song to the given time.
seek.failure: ‚ùå Current song could not be seeked.
